adviseScripts.text: Old-Timer!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Belorta keeps teasing me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: What can I do to make her stop?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: You should tease her back.
Have her come tease me instead.
Me, tease Belorta?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I've never thought about it...
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: But I'll give it a try!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I couldn't do that!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: You're a good person! I don't want you to suffer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I make plans with Mica to deal with Belorta's teasing.
Old-Timer! Belorta says that if you want to help others,
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: first you should figure out what you can get in return.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I help Belorta out all the time,
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: so, what should I get in return?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Something good to eat.
A "No Teasing for a Day" voucher.
I don't think that would work.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Belorta loves eating too much.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: She wouldn't give up a single crumb.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: That's a great idea!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Every time I help Belorta, I'll ask her for that!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Mica about how to stop being a pushover.
Hey... Old-Timer...
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Um... Between me and Belorta...
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: who do you like more?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: You.
I don't have a favorite.
Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Haha. Hearing you say that makes me feel happy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: But, wait, Belorta was the one who told me to ask you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: If I tell her what you said... I'll probably get in trouble, won't I?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Huh? That's not what I thought you'd say...
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Anyway, I only asked you because Belorta told me to. What should I tell her?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Mica and I try and figure out a way not to get in trouble with Belorta.
A few days ago,
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I gave some of my food to this really hungry stray dog.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Then a cat came over, so I shared some of my food with it as well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Eventually... I had nothing left for myself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Belorta got really mad when she found out.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Why do you think she was so upset?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Because there was nothing left for you to eat.
Because there was nothing left for her to eat.
That can't be it! Belorta always steals my food!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Yeah, that's gotta be it!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I forgot about that. Gee, Old-Timer, you're so smart!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Mica about Belorta's eating habits.
Old-Timer! Old-Timer!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I heard that if you really want to be an adult, you've got to work on self-development.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: So... if you don't, then you can't become an adult, right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Exactly.
That's not how it works.
Ha ha! Great.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I never want to become an adult!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Self-development? Hah! I'll do my best to stay away from it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: No?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: So, even if I don't do it, I'll still become an adult anyway?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Aw, man! That stinks.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I try to come up with ways for Mica not to become an adult.
So, I was watching TV,
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: and they said that if you're smart, you won't get fooled by pranks so easily.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: So, starting today, I'm gonna be smart!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: If I'm smart, no one will be able to prank me! Right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: You're probably right.
Is that really true?
Ha ha! Fantastic!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: If you think it'll work out, then I'm sure it will.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Oh... Don't say that!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Getting pranked, even if I'm smart...
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I'm getting anxious just thinking about it!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I discuss ways to become smarter with Mica.
Old-Timer, what do you do when you're sad?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I cry like a little baby.
I shove it down deep inside.
Whoa! You're just like me!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I just let the tears flow.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Then, Belorta holds my hand and tells me everything is gonna be okay.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Hmm... you're more like Belorta.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: That's no way to deal with sadness!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: If you don't say anything, no one will hold your hand and tell you everything is gonna be okay.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Mica about expressing sadness.
Old-Timer, I'm curious about something.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: What's the one thing you are most scared of?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Did Belorta put you up to this?
Belorta.
How did you know?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: She sure did.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I have no idea why, though.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Wow! So, even Old-Timer feels that way about her?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I really like Belorta, but she can be really scary sometimes.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I chat with Mica about the scariest things in the world.
Neon yells out "Firepower!" whenever she sees me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: What should I yell back at her?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Firepower!
Firecracker!
The same thing she says?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Isn't there anything else I can say?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: That's a good one!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: From now on, I'll yell "Firecracker!" back at her.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Mica about Neon.
I'm worried because no one comes to our toy shop.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Do you think nobody likes toys anymore?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Maybe they're just afraid of getting pranked.
I don't think people are into toys.
Ah! So that's why no one's coming!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: They're all afraid of getting pranked.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Ha ha ha. They're all just like me!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Aw, man... You really think so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: That stinks.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: It'd be so much fun if everyone came. We could all play together...
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Mica about the toy store.
Hey, there's this person... whenever I look at them, my heart feels funny.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: What's the deal?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: You have feelings for them.
Probably heart disease.
Seriously?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: But I was talking about you...
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Does that mean... I have feelings for you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: What?! You mean I'm sick? No, I can't be!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: What should I do? Should I go to the hospital?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Mica about her peculiar heart situation.
Belorta said we should cook you up something as a gift.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: She also said to keep it a secret, so no blabbing about it!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Can't wait to try it.
I don't want to eat it.
I'm excited to see what you think of it!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Belorta was asking me what to put in it and she looked really excited!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: ... Why? Why won't you eat it? Is it because I told you about it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I knew I shouldn't have told you...
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Aw man, I'm gonna be in big trouble with Belorta now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Mica and I talk more about food.
I had a terrible nightmare last night. This terrifying ghost emerged and came after me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: What if it comes out again tonight? I don't think I can sleep.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I'll stay with you until you fall asleep.
It's just a dream, so why don't you fight the ghost?
Really? Hehe. Thanks, Old-Timer!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I might actually be able to get a peaceful night's sleep, thanks to you!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Sure, but you don't realize it's a dream when you're actually dreaming.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: It feels just like real life, that's why it's so scary.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Mica and I talk about dreams.
Hey, have you ever been to an amusement park?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I heard there are all sorts of cool rides there and lots of good eats!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I want to go!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Next time, I'll take you and Belorta.
I'd like to go one day as well.
Wow! Really? We'd all have a blast going together!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I want to go! When should we go?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I would have thought you'd gone already.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: You think there will be a day we can all go together?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I share a conversation with Mica about amusement parks.
I just love Belorta to death!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: She may tease me a lot, but she doesn't really mean it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I hope she'll still be around 10, even 20 years from now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Do you think she'll still be friends with me then?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: You never know. People change.
I'll be there for you as well.
But I'm a Nikke, not a human...
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Does anyone know whether Nikkes change or not?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: You'll be there too? That's great!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Me, Belorta, and you together forever!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Mica and I have fun chatting.
You're one of the good adults, Old-Timer. You're super kind.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Are all adults like you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I'm afraid not.
Yes.
Belorta said the same thing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: She told me you're an exception.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Either way, I'm just happy that you're one of the good ones!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Whoa! Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I'm glad to hear there are lots more kind people out there like you!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Mica and I continue our discussion.
Old-Timer! Old-Timer! Belorta and I are gonna cook up a new firework today!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: What kind of firework should we make?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: One that's full of color, like a rainbow.
Something nice and loud.
Hmm... If pretty is all it has going for it, I'm not sure Belorta will like it...
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I'll have to see what she says.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Oooh, I haven't made a really big firework before!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Now I'm curious! I'll go tell Belorta we have to make one!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Mica about fireworks.
I'm officially off for the day!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: This is the first time in ages I've had some time to myself. What should I do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Want to hang out?
You should try and improve yourself somehow.
You've got time to hang out with me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: That's awesome! What should we do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: But... why so serious?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: It's my day off...
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Mica and I make plans to go out and have fun.
Belorta asked what my hobbies were today, and I didn't know how to respond.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Is it really that important that I have a hobby?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I'm sure we can figure something out together.
It's good to have at least one.
Okay, sounds good!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Now, obviously you're supposed to enjoy your hobby...
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: So what is it that I enjoy doing...
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I guess you're right about that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: But I don't have any. Any ideas?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Mica and I try to figure out a hobby for her.
Hey Old-Timer, would you prefer a world where it's always nighttime,
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: or always daytime?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Always daytime.
Always nighttime.
But if there's no nighttime, we can't set off any fireworks...
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: If you ask me, I'd rather go without the daytime.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Heck yeah, who needs the daytime anyway!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Great minds think alike!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I need the nighttime for setting off fireworks!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Mica and I have a nice little chat.
